website_summaries.verdict: Clearly the best choice if you want a real pearl necklace but also have to keep within your budget. An incredible value for Akoya pearls.
pros: This necklace gets high marks for offering similar features to our top pick at a much lower price
Stands out for high-quality pearls, double-knotted silk threading, and bonus pearl earrings
cons: AA rating means lower quality than the top strands
Only available in 6.5-7.0 mm size pearls

customer_reviews.title: Very good all the way around.
customer_reviews.text: These pearls look good on my wife. And she likes them, too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Radano

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves her new pearls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a xmas present because my wife has said I never bought her any pearls before. I received the pearls with everything advertised plus a neat little certificate of authenticity and appraisal value. They were well worth the money plus I got them at a steal during cyber monday. All in all, my wife loved them and wore them immediately to Xmas dinner. Good quality pearls for being on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Her
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my girlfriend as a Valentines Day gift and she loved them. I'm no expert but the pearls were round with no defects. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife, Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was very fast and though I am no expert, the pearls on each item were very round, uniform and lustrous. My wife, who received these pearls as a Valentine's Day present was thrilled and she is much more knowledgeable than I. It was a nice, smooth transaction with no problems and I'd order from PearlPro again.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, but too white. I love the satin color.
customer_reviews.author: DIANNA PHAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful string of pearls and earrings. Consistent sizing, beautiful luster, and clasp is very nice. A great value, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: ORIGINAL PRICE DOES NOT MATCH THE QUALITY OF NECKLACE
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about purchasing this pearl necklace for my daughter's birthday. When it arrived I was very, very disappointed. The descriptive details given on this necklace made it seems as if it was beautiful and a real steal. Well it was neither. Rather this necklace was dull and boring. It looked very inexpensive.It had no real luster or shine and it was very old looking. It did have some weight to it; but that's it. If you are looking for something without spark then this is for you; however if you want something that sparkles and brings a smile to your face, then go with something else. Remember you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: On Easter morning I received the most beautiful Akoya pearls
customer_reviews.text: On Easter morning I received the most beautiful Akoya pearls. Far better than expected. I highly recommend these lovely pearls.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa LaCalamita

customer_reviews.title: Pearls for Her
customer_reviews.text: The pearls are amazing. I am extremely happy with this purchase. I like the way that the necklace and earrings were packed. Thank you for helping me make Christmas grand for my special person.
customer_reviews.author: alexander cabral

customer_reviews.title: satisfied but skeptical
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived well-packaged. Although l am no pearl expert, l am satisfied with the appearance and esp. with the price. But l am skeptical of the quality as advertised. The ad shows list price of $1,659 and price of $495. So sale price of $199 appears to be too good to be true for AAA Akoya pearls and list price is just an inflated marketing ploy. Another reviewer of similar pearls from seller said cert. of authenticity done by seller instead of independent appraiser so lowered rating by one star. But l am on tight budget and still feel like l got a good deal for good quality pearl necklace.
customer_reviews.author: BB
